0.name: BAD WORDS
0.action: Detect and handle messages containing specific bad words or phrases.

1.name: SPAM DETECTION
1.action: Identify and handle spam messages based on frequency and content.

2.name: LINK FILTERING
2.action: Filter and manage messages containing links, with options for allowed domains.

3.name: MENTION SPAM
3.action: Detect and handle messages that excessively mention other users.

4.name: MASS CAPS DETECTION
4.action: Identify and manage messages that contain an excessive amount of capital letters.

5.name: DISCORD INVITES FILTERING
5.action: Identify and manage messages that contain Discord server invite links.

BotNotInServer.pageTitle: The bot is not present in the server
BotNotInServer.title: This server requires additional setup
BotNotInServer.p: It looks like the bot is not in your server yet. To get started, please invite the bot to your server by clicking the button below.

command.title: General Commands
command.user: Displays information about a specific user, including their roles and join date
command.server: Provides detailed information about the server, such as member count and creation date
command.roles: Lists all the roles available on the server
command.ping: Checks the bot's response time to the server
command.banner: Displays the server's banner image, if set
command.avatar: Shows the avatar of a specified user

commands.title: Mod Commands
commands.ban: Bans a user from the server, with optional reason
commands.unban: Unbans a user from the server
commands.clear: Clears a specified number of messages from a channel
commands.kick: Kicks a user from the server
commands.lock: Locks a channel to prevent users from sending messages
commands.move: Moves a user to another voice channel
commands.role: Assigns or removes a role from a user
commands.timeout: Puts a user in timeout, preventing them from sending messages
commands.unlock: Unlocks a channel to allow users to send messages
commands.unwarn: Removes a warning from a user
commands.vkick: Kicks a user from a voice channel
commands.vmute: Mutes a user in a voice channel
commands.warn: Issues a warning to a user
commands.warns: Displays the warnings a user has received

community.title: Join Our Community
community.description: Get help, discover new features, and meet other Wicks Bot users.

hero.title: Create a first-rate Discord community!
hero.paragraph: A highly adaptable bot featuring welcome images, detailed logs, social commands, moderation tools, and an array of other functionalities, all customizable to suit your server's needs

future_1.head: Role Management
future_1.title: Add Or Remove Roles From Members
future_1.paragraph: This feature enables platform administrators to manage member roles by adding or removing them, facilitating efficient organization of permissions and functions within the platform.

future_2.head: Server Welcoming

future_2.paragraph: The Custom Server Welcoming feature would provide a warm and personalized experience for new members joining the Server.

future_3.head: Ticketing System
future_3.title: Customizable Ticket Form Fields
future_3.paragraph: Ability to assign the appropriate category for the ticket (technical support, billing, general inquiries, etc.).

future_4.title: Protection System
future_4.paragraph: is one of the best in Discord

footer.text_1: Access all features from us and let us handle all your server needs!
footer.text_2: Access to more features with Premium Plan!

policy.title: Privacy Policy
policy.subtitle: Your privacy matters to us. Learn how we handle, protect, and respect your data while using Wicks Bot.

sections.title: Our Commitment
sections.content: At Wicks Bot, we prioritize the protection of your privacy and personal information. This policy outlines our practices for collecting, using, and safeguarding your data while using our Discord bot and associated services.

sections.title: Information We Collect
sections.content: We collect and process the following data to provide our services:
list: Discord profile information (user ID, username, server roles)
Server configuration preferences
Bot interaction data and command usage

sections.title: How We Use Your Data
sections.content: Your data helps us deliver and enhance our services:
list: Providing core bot functionality and features
Maintaining your preferences and settings
Ensuring platform security and preventing abuse
Communicating important updates and changes

sections.title: Data Security
sections.content: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your information:
list: End-to-end encryption for data transmission
Regular security audits and updates
Strict access controls and authentication
Compliance with Discord's security standards
sections.footer: While we implement robust security measures, no online service can guarantee 100% security.

sections.title: Data Storage
sections.content: Your data is securely stored on servers located in the European Union. We retain data only as long as necessary for service provision and legal compliance. You may request data deletion at any time through our support channels.

sections.title: Your Rights
sections.content: You have several rights regarding your personal data:
list: Access your stored data
Request corrections to inaccurate information
Request deletion of your data
sections.footer: Contact our support team to exercise these rights.

sections.title: Third-Party Services
sections.content: We utilize select third-party services to enhance our bot's functionality:
list: Discord API for core features
Cloud hosting providers for data storage
sections.footer: Each third-party service maintains its own privacy policy and data handling practices.

sections.title: Policy Updates
sections.content: We may update this privacy policy periodically to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. We'll notify users of significant changes through our Discord server or email notifications.

sections.title: Contact Us
sections.content: For questions or concerns about your privacy and data protection, reach out to us at:
list: Email: support@wick-studio.com
Discord: Join our support server

rolesSec_1.title: ENABLED ROLES
rolesSec_1.noRolep: No roles have been added to the protection. Please add a role to get started with setting up the rate limits and actions.

rolesSec_2.title: RESTRICT PROTECTION SETTINGS TO SERVER OWNER
rolesSec_2.p_1: Note: When enabled, only the server owner can edit the protection settings.
rolesSec_2.p_2: Administrators and other users won't have access.

rolesSec_3.title: DASHBOARD ACCESS PERMISSION
rolesSec_3.p_1: This setting determines the minimum permission level required for a user
rolesSec_3.p_2: to access and modify the server's dashboard settings.
rolesSec_3.p_3: We highly recommend setting this to Administrator.

rolesSec_4.title: TRUSTED BOTS
rolesSec_4.p_1: Add trusted bot IDs to this list. Only the bots added here will be allowed to join the server.
rolesSec_4.p_2: All other bots that attempt to join will be automatically kicked.

terms.metaDescription: Review our terms of service to understand your rights and responsibilities when using Wicks Bot
terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.subtitle: Please read these terms carefully before using Wicks Bot. By using our services, you agree to be bound by these terms.

sections.title: Acceptance of Terms
sections.content: By accessing or using Wicks Bot, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not accept these terms, please do not use our services.
list: You must be at least 13 years old to use our services
You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account
You agree to provide accurate and complete information when creating an account

sections.title: Premium Services
sections.content: Our premium features require payment and additional terms:
list: All payments are processed securely through authorized payment providers
Premium features are subject to availability and may change
Refunds are handled according to our refund policy
Subscription terms may be modified with notice

sections.title: User Conduct
sections.content: Users must follow these guidelines when using our services:
list: No harassment, hate speech, or discriminatory behavior
No spamming or automated abuse of our services
No unauthorized access or interference with our systems
Respect Discord's Terms of Service and Community Guidelines

sections.title: Service Availability
sections.content: While we strive for reliable service, we cannot guarantee uninterrupted access:
list: Services may be temporarily unavailable for maintenance
We are not liable for any service interruptions
We reserve the right to modify or discontinue features
sections.footer: We will make reasonable efforts to notify users of significant changes or interruptions.

sections.title: Intellectual Property
sections.content: All content and materials provided through our services are protected by intellectual property rights:
list: Our branding, logos, and designs are our exclusive property
Users may not copy or modify our content without permission
User-generated content remains the property of the creator

sections.title: Account Termination
sections.content: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend accounts:
list: Violations of these terms may result in immediate termination
Users will be notified of termination when possible
Premium subscribers may receive partial refunds for unused service

sections.title: Changes to Terms
sections.content: We may update these terms periodically:
list: Users will be notified of significant changes
Continued use after changes constitutes acceptance
Previous versions will be archived and available upon request

sections.title: Contact Information
sections.content: For questions or concerns about these terms, please contact us:
list: Email: support@wick-studio.com
Discord: Join our support server

refund.title: Refund Policy
refund.subtitle: Clear guidelines on our refund procedures and eligibility criteria

sections.title: Eligible Refund Scenarios
sections.content: We understand that issues can arise, and we're committed to fair refund practices. The following situations may qualify for a full or prorated refund:
list: Unauthorized transactions verified by payment provider
Technical issues preventing access to main premium features for over 24 hours
Service outages lasting more than 24 consecutive hours
Duplicate charges or billing errors
Premium features significantly different from advertised
sections.footer: All refund requests must be accompanied by appropriate documentation or evidence.

sections.title: Non-Refundable Situations
sections.content: To maintain fair service delivery, refunds will not be processed in the following cases:
list: Refunds for subscription renewals are generally not provided. However, if a cancellation request is made within '48 hours of renewal', we may offer a refund at our discretion.
Change of mind after feature usage
Requests without valid service-related reasoning or documentation
Violation of our Terms of Service

sections.title: Refund Process
sections.content: To request a refund, please follow these steps:
list: Contact our support team through Discord or email
Include your transaction ID and account information
Explain your refund reason clearly
Provide relevant details or screenshots if available
Allow 5-7 business days for review and processing

sections.title: Important Notes
sections.content: Please be aware of the following when requesting refunds:
list: We review each request individually on its merits
Approved refunds are processed within 5-7 business days
Partial refunds may be offered for partial service issues
If a refund is not possible, we may offer account credits or other resolutions
Multiple refund requests may require additional review
sections.footer: Questions about refunds? Contact our support team at support@wicksbot.com - we're here to help!
